values.description: Enables configuration of influxdb server on startup.
Disabled configuration of influxdb server on startup.
Latest 1.5.x alpine version. Ref https://hub.docker.com/_/influxdb for further info.
Latest 1.6.x alpine version. Ref https://hub.docker.com/_/influxdb for further info.
Latest 1.7.x alpine version. Ref https://hub.docker.com/_/influxdb for further info.
